CustomField.description: This field was introduced to allow for rolling up Score values from a Child Source (Record Type = Corporate Security Standard) to a Master Source (Record Type = Corporate Security Policy). The Field Name was made generic just in case future scenarios arise for the use of this field where the specific "Policy" API Name would make no sense.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Security Policy that this Security Standard is related to
CustomField.label: Policy
